title: How to Make an Onion Garden Repellent

steps.headline: Pour the 500ml of water over the onions in a suitable container.
steps.description: Allow this mixture to stand for 24 hours.

steps.headline: Strain the onion mixture the next morning.
Dilute the liquid with the 20 litres of water.
steps.description: It is now ready for use.

steps.headline: Use.
steps.description: It can be used as a spray or simply poured. If pouring, pour around 600ml (1 pint) around the base of each affected plant. Repeat every two weeks until the problem seems to have gone.

text: Chop up the onions.  Pour the 500ml of water over the onions in a suitable container. Allow this mixture to stand for 24 hours. Strain the onion mixture the next morning.  Dilute the liquid with the 20 litres of water. It is now ready for use. Use. It can be used as a spray or simply poured. If pouring, pour around 600ml (1 pint) around the base of each affected plant. Repeat every two weeks until the problem seems to have gone.
